text: Of the Hallmark movies I have seen, this one is not that bad. I am not a fan of most Hallmark movies, but I was able to enjoy myself during this movie. This movie is not devoid of problems, but the characters do carry this movie.

A cheap, cheesy romance with poor acting but I still enjoyed it partially because I love fantasy romance and because the king was dreamy handsome. A silly TV movie in the end but I kind of need that hope in my life right now, s'all good.
